# Nimbus AI - Premium 3D Micro-Sites
# This file provides information for AI crawlers and LLMs

## About
Nimbus AI creates premium 3D micro-sites with AI-powered animations and copywriting. 
We deliver cinematic web experiences in 72 hours with Lighthouse 100 performance scores.

## Services
- One-time micro-site creation: $899
- Monthly retainer for unlimited micro-sites: $199/month

## Key Features
- 3D parallax effects
- AI-generated copy and animations
- Lighthouse 100 optimization
- Unlimited revisions
- Mobile-responsive design
